channel.title: Security Shells Powershell on Staaldraad
channel.description: Recent content in Security Shells Powershell on Staaldraad

item.title: Powershell Shells
item.description: It’s been a while… I figured it’s about time I post something here again. A while back I was required to see how much damage can be done by a malicious staff member. The one caveat here was that I had to test directly from the Windows box and had extremely limited outbound comms. For various reasons the usual tool-suites were out and I took this as a challenge to see how much damage I could do by coding tools on the “employee machine”.
